an8.2:1.1: “Atthime, bhikkhave, hetu attha paccaya adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattanti.
an8.2:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattharam upanissaya viharati annataram va garutthaniyam sabrahmacarim, yatthassa tibbam hirottappam paccupatthitam hoti pemanca garavo ca.
an8.2:1.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo hetu pathamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:2.1: So tam sattharam upanissaya viharanto annataram va garutthaniyam sabrahmacarim, yatthassa tibbam hirottappam paccupatthitam hoti pemanca garavo ca, te kalena kalam upasankamitva paripucchati paripanhati:
an8.2:2.3: Tassa te ayasmanto avivatanceva vivaranti, anuttanikatanca uttanikaronti, anekavihitesu ca kankhathaniyesu dhammesu kankham pativinodenti.
an8.2:2.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:3.1: So tam dhammam sutva dvayena vupakasena sampadeti—kayavupakasena ca cittavupakasena ca.
an8.2:3.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:4.1: Silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an8.2:4.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:5.1: Bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. Ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
an8.2:5.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo hetu pancamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:6.1: Araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an8.2:6.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, chattho hetu chattho paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:7.1: Sanghagato kho pana ananakathiko hoti atiracchanakathiko.
an8.2:7.2: Samam va dhammam bhasati param va ajjhesati ariyam va tunhibhavam natimannati.
an8.2:7.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, sattamo hetu sattamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:8.1: Pancasu kho pana upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassi viharati:
an8.2:8.2: ‘iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
an8.2:8.3: iti vedana, iti vedanaya samudayo, iti vedanaya atthangamo;
an8.2:8.6: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti.
an8.2:8.7: Ayam, bhikkhave, atthamo hetu atthamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
an8.2:9.2: ‘ayam kho ayasma sattharam upanissaya viharati annataram va garutthaniyam sabrahmacarim, yatthassa tibbam hirottappam paccupatthitam hoti pemanca garavo ca.
an8.2:9.3: Addha ayamayasma janam janati passam passati’ti.
an8.2:9.4: Ayampi dhammo piyattaya garuttaya bhavanaya samannaya ekibhavaya samvattati.

an8.2:16.6: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamoti.
an8.2:16.7: Addha ayamayasma janam janati passam passati’ti.
an8.2:16.8: Ayampi dhammo piyattaya garuttaya bhavanaya samannaya ekibhavaya samvattati.
an8.2:17.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha hetu attha paccaya adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattanti”ti.
